title: Aranmula Kannadi
short_description: A unique handmade metal-alloy mirror from Kerala, where the reflection comes from the front surface.
long_description:
Aranmula Kannadi is a handmade metal-alloy mirror, made in Aranmula, a small village in Kerala. Unlike normal glass mirrors where the reflection comes from the back coating, here the metal itself is polished to create a reflective surface (front surface reflection). 

The exact composition of the alloy (copper and tin) is a closely guarded family secret. It is considered one of the eight auspicious items (Ashtamangalyam) in Kerala tradition and brings good luck.
traditional_methods: Polishing for days with hessian cloth and oil.
shipping_and_packaging_tips: Fragile surface. Do not touch with fingers (oils spoil polish).
authenticity_tips: Place a fingertip on the surface; if there is no gap between the finger and reflection, it is real. Hologram required.
seo_title: Aranmula Kannadi: The Mysterious Metal Mirror
seo_description: Discover Aranmula Kannadi, the secret metal mirror of Kerala. A front-reflection mirror bringing prosperity and luck.
